area: Lyme Regis to Lands End including the Isles of Scilly (8)

forecast.wind: Southwesterly 3 or 4 at first in west, otherwise southerly or southwesterly 6 to gale 8, veering westerly or southwesterly 5 to 7, perhaps gale 8 later.
forecast.sea: Rough throughout in far west, otherwise moderate or rough.
